column1: [[Image:Silme nuquerna.gif|left]]'''''Silmë Nuquerna''''' is the name in [[Quenya]] of the thirtieth letter of the [[Tengwar]] alphabet.<ref>{{App|Letters}}
column3: ''The names of the letters''</ref>  In form it is an inversion of the twenty-ninth letter ([[Silmë]]).  It is mostly used as a variation
column7: ''The additional letters''</ref> and it represents '''S'''.   However
column9: as seen as in the inscription on the [[Doors of Durin|West-gate]] of [[Moria]]
column12: ''The vowels''</ref>  The Westron name for this letter is '''''Ós'''''.<ref>See [[Westron Tengwar]]</ref>
